name: Chase Flow
triggers: when a chase begins between pursuers and quarry
steps: Identify quarry and pursuers; roll initiative if needed.
Set starting distance and track the lead pursuer.
Each round, resolve movement and actions; most participants Dash.
Apply Dashing limits and Exhaustion checks as required.
On initiative count 0, resolve escape checks if the chase continues.
End the chase when the quarry escapes or pursuers catch up.
